code: import{legacy_createStore as createStore}from"redux";import{applyMiddleware}from"redux";import{composeWithDevTools}from"redux-devtools-extension";import thunk from"redux-thunk";import allReducer from"./reducers/allReducers";var myStore=createStore(allReducer,composeWithDevTools(applyMiddleware(thunk)));export default myStore;
